title: Chukzy1992
author: Chukzy1992
content: In the journey of life, most times we are presured how fast the world is living us behind, so it makes us to think how to fast track our life, but the truth is that there is a difference between motion and movement..You can be in motion still not moving, we can say direction is better than speed.The truth is that everything takes time regardless of how fast you go, you can't rush life;there is a saying if you want to go fast go alone, but if you choose to go far go with a team, rushing is always in our DNA(blood),we rush to become an adult before learning to be a kid, we rush to build a billion dollar business before working on our start up, and we also rush to have sex before knowing what sex is all about, when you rush life you lose out some of the beautiful things life have to offer, so life is all about stages, for example you can't just wake up one morning and decide to be the president of the country no it doesn't work like that, you have to work towards it, even the book of life states "there is time for everything.In conclusion;life is stages, we count one before counting two, likewise you can't force some one to love you, the truth is just do the right thing be hardworking and have that believe your wish will come through, rushing life might end you up in a critical condition.At the end when time comes no one can stop you, whatever has your name on it can pass to another person.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: I think this is a young man's attitude.Â  If 1992 is your birthday, you are literally in the period of your life that you need to rush life a bit.Â  You aren't going to live forever and as you age you're going to notice that things you took for granted become much more difficult.Â  Simple things take much more effort and preparation.Â  Don't fall into this trap that life is long and you can move slowly through it.Â  It isn't.Â  Your youth will be gone in the blink of an eye and someday going for a run around the block will seem like something you wish you had done daily until you were unable to do so anymore.I say rush life.Â  Do all the things.Â  Someday you won't be able to.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: ^^^ Right! Especially if you live in Rushia.

comments.author: Chukzy1992
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on March 24, 2023, 08:25:36 PM^^^ Right! Especially if you live in Rushia.Â  Â  Â  [/quote ðŸ˜„ funny Rushia rush life.

comments.author: Chukzy1992
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on March 24, 2023, 05:29:32 PMI think this is a young man's attitude.Â  If 1992 is your birthday, you are literally in the period of your life that you need to rush life a bit.Â  You aren't going to live forever and as you age you're going to notice that things you took for granted become much more difficult.Â  Simple things take much more effort and preparation.Â  Don't fall into this trap that life is long and you can move slowly through it.Â  It isn't.Â  Your youth will be gone in the blink of an eye and someday going for a run around the block will seem like something you wish you had done daily until you were unable to do so anymore.I say rush life.Â  Do all the things.Â  Someday you won't be able to.Yeah,rushing the life is individual differences, just that everyone really needs to meet up the life activities, but rush with ease.

comments.author: CODE200
comments.body: "Time flies so fast" the saying the we always heard as people go older. Most of the time we dont recognize time because of being busy on things we do in life. At some moment in my life, I do feel rushing my life how do I say so? Its when I cant stop myself ro get jealous when I see my colleagues reaching their dreams and here I am staying and trying to find what my real purspose in this world. Its hard to not think about it but I still keep holding on the saying "we have our own perfect moment and timing in life". Life is different on every people, it may be easy for them or hard for you, however we must always be strong all the time in order to reach our goal. Right now im more on letting myself to go with the flow of my life. Im enjoying every moment I have with myself, family and my love one. Plans may not happen like we think on our life but believe that God has always a better plan for us.

Plans may not happen like we think on our life but believe that God has always a better plan for us.  on earth here everyone sees life as a competition especially when your peer groups are doing much better than you, you might not really tell the source where there richness is coming from, at that point you really want to meet up just like them it might end you up in doing something stupid just to make that money..

comments.author: Rockstarguy
comments.body: Their is no need to rush life, life is about planing. It is better to be slow and plan well to be in theÂ  right direction than to rush life, take a speed and still be in the wrong direction. If life is well planned their will be good outcomes of result but when life is rushed to achieve things so fast, mist times it normally ends so bad. Their are things in life which I never planned very well for them, I was just so in haste to achieve things but it didn't work out well for me. No need to rush life on a speed, life requires good planning,Â  even if planning will take time but as far as a good result is certain it is better.

comments.author: Chukzy1992
comments.body: Quote from: Rockstarguy on March 25, 2023, 06:48:02 AMTheir is no need to rush life, life is about planing. It is better to be slow and plan well to be in theÂ  right direction than to rush life, take a speed and still be in the wrong direction. If life is well planned their will be good outcomes of result but when life is rushed to achieve things so fast, mist times it normally ends so bad. Their are things in life which I never planned very well for them, I was just so in haste to achieve things but it didn't work out well for me. No need to rush life on a speed, life requires good planning,Â  even if planning will take time but as far as a good result is certain it is better. you have said it all, rushing without no good plan makes you end up in a wrong direction, having a good plan structure makes you archive your desire goal no matter the how long it takes...

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: This life is to be taken with ease and not rushing while in pursuit of achieving anything, there's no shortcut in making it in life as everything about this life has protocols on time and season, everyone is placed with the same opportunity to make it in life only if we can discover such potential in us and work towards it in creating values others will appreciate and accept, and we must not watch others progress in other not to get us discouraged or rush as well about making it in life.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Life is too short so I would advise you to do everything you can to enjoy it as much as you can as often as you can. Donâ€™t spend time doing things that are of no value to you & donâ€™t waste time with people who arenâ€™t good for you.The only guaranteed thing in life is death, we are all going to die so make the most of every day you have on earth alive. Always try to be the best version of yourself possible & live with no regrets.

Always try to be the best version of yourself possible & live with no regrets.I just pick a word from your quote, dont spend time doing things that are of no value.

comments.author: Raceonsucced
comments.body: You're right, everything takes stages. at the same time we are born into this world. we used to be toddlers, over time we become children, teenagers, adults, and elderly. work, and success is the same. all there is no need to rush, because it could be when you are too hasty everything will get messed up. enjoy the process, because that's where we will feel happy and grateful.

comments.author: Ndabagi01
comments.body: Nice advice, and one that is relatable. It is true that what is written for you will not pass you by, and it is also true that in order to achieve success in life, you must stand up and work for it. There are times to rush and times to be calm in life; just make sure you do the right thing at the right time. Life does not wait for anyone, so make the most of it while you still can.

comments.author: FireDAOJackie_Z
comments.body: Quote from: Chukzy1992 on March 24, 2023, 10:39:52 PMQuote from: OgNasty on March 24, 2023, 05:29:32 PMI think this is a young man's attitude.Â  If 1992 is your birthday, you are literally in the period of your life that you need to rush life a bit.Â  You aren't going to live forever and as you age you're going to notice that things you took for granted become much more difficult.Â  Simple things take much more effort and preparation.Â  Don't fall into this trap that life is long and you can move slowly through it.Â  It isn't.Â  Your youth will be gone in the blink of an eye and someday going for a run around the block will seem like something you wish you had done daily until you were unable to do so anymore.I say rush life.Â  Do all the things.Â  Someday you won't be able to.Yeah,rushing the life is individual differences, just that everyone really needs to meet up the life activities, but rush with ease.If OgNasty's guess on OP's age is right, I think reason why OP brought this topic up is because you are in your early thirties under a lot of pressure. I have been there and totally get what you mean. Life should not be rushed and this can help you ease a lot of situations when you get into trouble now in this stage of life. However, things will change and one day you'll agree with Mr.OgNasty as you feel less time left and more things undone. "The days are long but the decades are short". All of us will get the meaning of it sooner or later so don't rush and don't judge, we will all know one day.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: ^^^ Need to watch the new movie "Jesus Revolution." That movie is all about younger people finding solidity in life through coming to faith in Jesus. It's almost a documentary about what happened in the 1970s in California.

comments.author: Alisha-k
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on March 24, 2023, 05:29:32 PMI think this is a young man's attitude.Â  If 1992 is your birthday, you are literally in the period of your life that you need to rush life a bit.Â  You aren't going to live forever and as you age you're going to notice that things you took for granted become much more difficult.Â  Simple things take much more effort and preparation.Â  Don't fall into this trap that life is long and you can move slowly through it.Â  It isn't.Â  Your youth will be gone in the blink of an eye and someday going for a run around the block will seem like something you wish you had done daily until you were unable to do so anymore.I say rush life.Â  Do all the things.Â  Someday you won't be able to. I do not think rushing life is the best option, neither is taking things slowly an option but in whatever step and stage you're at, it is expedient to take everything easily..Rushing might land you in difficult times where ordinarily you wouldn't be so it's best to handle every stage with utmost attention, care and ease.

comments.author: Queentoshi
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on March 24, 2023, 05:29:32 PMI think this is a young man's attitude.Â  If 1992 is your birthday, you are literally in the period of your life that you need to rush life a bit.Â  You aren't going to live forever and as you age you're going to notice that things you took for granted become much more difficult.Â  Simple things take much more effort and preparation.Â  Don't fall into this trap that life is long and you can move slowly through it.Â  It isn't.Â  Your youth will be gone in the blink of an eye and someday going for a run around the block will seem like something you wish you had done daily until you were unable to do so anymore.I say rush life.Â  Do all the things.Â  Someday you won't be able to.Life is stage by stage, once you miss any stage is gone, when someone has pass his or her 30s, then that person knows that time is going and may need to rush life, so he can meet up the pressure, the main still is to have a focus and not to fall into doing wrongs things just because you want to meet up, as we are growing the more pressure we face. Because people are already looking up to you. And almost everybody has a target that before I get to the age I won't have done this and that.

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: Quote from: Ndabagi01 on March 25, 2023, 11:22:49 PMNice advice, and one that is relatable. It is true that what is written for you will not pass you by, and it is also true that in order to achieve success in life, you must stand up and work for it. There are times to rush and times to be calm in life; just make sure you do the right thing at the right time. Life does not wait for anyone, so make the most of it while you still can.You need to have the knowledge and also you need to be motivated on doing those things in order to successfully achieve it. therefore, invest in something beneficial when it comes to your personal life because no one really in this world will gonna help you on doing that except for yourself don't rely on anyone in this world to help you achieve your goals because there is a saying "it's a man for himself" it's better to be silent when you are preparing to reach your goal and just be humble when you finally reach the top.

comments.author: mu_enrico
comments.body: It's up to you whether or not you rush things, but you should know that each individual has his/her own timeline and pace. The trend about the glorification of the "young successful entrepreneur" is wrong and it shouldn't drive you to become one via the so-called "startups." You can be successful anywhere with any occupation, not just as CEO of some unicorn startups.Living your life to the fullest is better than rushing things. Enjoy your life and the process at your desired pace, and you'll eventually get there at the right time as long as you keep growing as an individual. But, there should be a sense of keep pushing your limit, and not lazy. As Mourinho said "I am 56 now, and yesterday I was 20."
